[Y]Parents Signoff
[W]Support curiosity with structure.
[c][m.]
[W]Encourage experimentation while
[W]setting clear routines for safety and
[W]documentation.
[W]Celebrate persistence and clear
[W]thinking, not just final polish.
[c][m.]
[G]- Routine matters.
[G]- Documentation matters.
[G]- Encouragement matters.
[m][m-]
[Y]FINAL NOTE
[C]Learning to debug is learning to
[C]think.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
